title: Aerial Phenomena
overview: From the beginnings of the UFO phenomena in the 1940s to the evolution of public disclosure through the subsequent decades, historian Richard Dolan highlights key events and figures from within the US government to expose the obscured truths of military involvement. For decades Dolan has worked for public acknowledgement of fact-based UFO history, which could help humanity achieve a greater future through gaining insight from our recent past.Richard Dolan is an author, historian, scholar, and one of the world's most respected ufologists. He has been exploring every facet of UFO and ET phenomena for two decades, contributing to the growing discourse surrounding Disclosure.
